body_html:
I'm also very interested in using TF Record-files with Keras. I read several issues, that are related to this feature, read the stack-overflow question (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42184863/how-do-you-make-tensorflow-keras-fast-with-a-tfrecord-dataset) and saw the pull request keras-team/keras-contrib#27

What is the current state of this Feature?
Can I merge the pull request into my local repository, or will the final implementation very different to this?

body:
I'm also very interested in using TF Record-files with Keras. I read several issues, that are related to this feature, read the stack-overflow question (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42184863/how-do-you-make-tensorflow-keras-fast-with-a-tfrecord-dataset) and saw the pull request https://github.com/farizrahman4u/keras-contrib/pull/27 

What is the current state of this Feature? 
Can I merge the pull request into my local repository, or will the final implementation very different to this?
